channel.title: Rotten potato [PI]
channel.description:
How can I add to my PI server a working rotten potato? One that you don't need to be in duel arena, just anywhere around the map.. What i need help is how to do it, but don't spoon feed me if you don't want, like should i add a gfx, where does the useonplayer goes or something like that.
Rotten potato working: You click on a rotten potato and click on a player, then you throw the rotten potato at him, and the potato falls to the floor.

item.title: Rotten potato [PI]
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

If you’re asking how to make it throw a potato, or tomato whichever you meant
itemonplayer packet, find the projectile gfx and well it should be self explanatory from there.
There is probably a guide somewhere…

Read full topic

item.title: Rotten potato [PI]
item.dc:creator: @sssylasss sssylasss
item.description:
@sssylasss wrote:

do it like magic, except it would be the itemOnPlayer packet.

Read full topic
